title: Drawing, "Recto: Studies of a Linden Branch / Verso: Studies of Raspberry Leaves", early 20th century
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 61
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Vertical sheet depicting a linden branch with leaves and berries, the foliage green with brown tinting.  On the verso, three studies of leaves and blossoms of a raspberry plant

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Recto: Studies of a Linden Branch / Verso: Studies of Raspberry Leaves", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Brush and watercolor on paper. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-10.
